DOC.brief_summary: This single center , double blind , randomize , parallel-group study assess effect 200mg caffeine,400mg caffeine decaffeinate acupuncture analgesia human pain model .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Caffeine Acupuncture Analgesia With Human Pain Model
DOC.detailed_description: Aim : To evaluate effect caffeine acupuncture analgesia human pain model . Design : Double blind , randomize control trial perform Chengdu . The study include two pain model : Potassium pain model Capsaicin pain model . Both model include follow several group : 200mg caffeine group , 400mg caffeine group , decaffeinate group . Participants randomly assign three group . Each participant receive coffee drinking acupuncture intervention . Each subject Potassium pain model receive measure pain baseline , 30 minute drink coffee , 10 , 20 , 30 minute acupuncture 30 minute acupuncture intervention complete . Blood sample collect baseline , 30 minute drink coffee , 30 minute acupuncture 30 minute acupuncture intervention complete . Each subject capsaicin pain model measure spontaneous pain VAS scale area hyperalgesia Von Frey hair time 5 minute topical application capsaicin , 30 minute drink coffee , 10 , 20 , 30 minute acupuncture 30 minute acupuncture intervention complete . Blood sample collect time 5 minute topical application capsaicin , 30 minute drink coffee , 30 minute acupuncture 30 minute acupuncture intervention complete .
DOC.criteria: Age subject 18 40 year old , male female No known active ongoing disease , good general health , BMI range 18 30 kg/m2 No history mental disorder , infectious disease bleed disorder . No history allergic reaction . Females pregnant , lactating , childbearing potential , pregnancy plan within 3 month No smoking , drink alcohol No intake beverage , food alcohol , contain caffeine least two hour No use methyl purine drug . No use drug , affect halflife caffeine , : cimetidine , steroid , growth hormone , etc No previous experience acupuncture relate treatment within 3 day Reliable , cooperative , adequate intelligence record request information questionnaire form Informed consent form must sign subject Subject serious blood , heart , liver , kidney disease , digestive , hematopoietic system disease Subject serious mental disorder , infectious disease bleed disorder . Subject history allergic reaction . Females pregnant , lactating , childbearing potential , pregnancy plan within 3 month ; Prior use type analgesic drug study within 5 halflives drug Use methyl purine drug . Use drug , affect halflife caffeine , : Sympathomimetic drug , theophylline drug , α βblockers drug , antihypertensive drug , etc Ingestion caffeinecontaining beverage , food alcohol 6 hour less study Subject previous experience acupuncture relate treatment within 7 day Suffered medical psychiatric disorder prevent participate study Subject belong acupuncturephobia
